#113 Best Private High Schools in Florida .

Solid Rock Community School

Blue checkmark.

Private School ,

TARPON SPRINGS, FL ,

K-12 ,

16 Niche users give it an average review of 3.6 stars.

Featured Review: Parent says We highly recommend Solid Rock. Been here 6 years. I feel leadership is helpful, care and communicate. The teachers have manageable classes and care about students. They get rid of teacher duds... The population is diverse and from a variety of family and economic backgrounds. They have a variety of parents and personalities. Some great. Some not. Kids of all types- gifted, special, typical.... The food from the school cafe is really nice. It’s all plant-based, which some parents complain about but I welcome it. We are not personally vegan but I love my child being offered fresh food made... The campus is clean. Feels safe. Facilities nice. All in all, it’s a great place. I recommend them to all my friends. .

Read 16 reviews.
